hypothesis_content.title: Intraday VWAP Reversion with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC price deviates >1.2% from the intraday VWAP (volume-weighted average price) on 15-minute charts during NEUTRAL regimes, and the deviation occurs on below-average volume for the time of day, price will revert to within 0.5% of VWAP within 4 hours with 70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: VWAP acts as a gravitational center during neutral trading. Low-volume deviations are often caused by large isolated orders rather than sustainable moves, creating reversion opportunities. Time-of-day volume normalization accounts for circadian patterns.
entry_conditions: BTC price > 1.2% away from current session VWAP (calculated from 00:00 UTC)
Current 15-minute volume < 75% of same-period average over last 20 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 0.5% of VWAP
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves additional 0.8% away from VWAP

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Win rate < 60% OR more than 35% of trades exceed 4-hour time limit without reversion in backtest.
